overview: The house on Lovers Lane has seen a lot of action in the past 200 years. Come inside and take a peek. Every room tells a story, and every story is a naughty bedtime tale. Aurora Snow serves up a sizzling anal scene for dessert. Tiffany Brookes teaches her college roommate how to pass the bad girl test, and Vanessa Lane gets nasty with the hired help. Enjoy 5 erotic tales from the lusty tenants of the most notorious place in town.
tagline: Stop By Our House Anytime...We're Dying To See You.
title: The House On Lovers Lane
